name: A week to find Paris
description:
Is a game made in my first ever global game jam which the themw was "Repair". In this case you will help repair the life of paris trough diferents activities.

Credits: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/week-find-paris-7

Programming : Me and Isael Alexander

Art by Geraldine Candia

Desgin by Erika Lucia

Music by EduRedPal
